channel.title: Blog Update on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Update on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blog Updates
item.description: I have just updated this blog with new features. Including a special “Image Post” that adds an image to the top of a post, and sets the background (eventually I’ll let it have seperate backgrounds). I have also added tags, the ability to show all posts with certain tags, et cetera. There’s some new minor changes as well. Including new psot sizes and proper mobile relfowing.
